result.markdown:
--- title: "user_study" format: html editor: visual --- ## Setup ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(readxl) library(foreach) library(stringr) library(dplyr) library(tokenizers) library(data.table) library(ggplot2) library(plyr) library(quanteda) library(SemNetCleaner) library(purrr) library(tidytext) library(tm) library(topicmodels) library(SnowballC) library(Matrix) library(text2vec) library(tidyr) library(janitor) library(GGally) library(formattable) library(kableExtra) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} data <- read_excel("data/results-survey3.xlsx") data <- data[1:121] %>% filter(.[[18]] !='Yes') # not analysed any EEG method ``` ::: ## Up or down ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.cell} ::: ## Experience ~ tools ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} vec <- names(data[25:50]) %>% str_split_i(., "\\[", 2) %>% str_sub(., 1, -2) software <- data[25:50] %>% rename_at(vars(colnames(.)), ~ vec) %>% mutate_at(vars(vec), function(., na.rm = FALSE) (x = ifelse(.=="Yes", 1, 0))) %>% cbind(data[20], .) %>% dplyr::rename(years = !!names(.)[1]) %>% filter(years < 50) %>% select_if(colSums(.) != 0) ``` ::: #### Tools and year of experince ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} a <- software %>% select_if(colSums(.) > 10) res <- a %>% dplyr::select(years, BESA) %>% group_by(BESA) %>% dplyr::summarise(mean(years)) %>% dplyr::rename(., Usage = BESA,BESA = `mean(years)`) cn <- colnames(a[3:length(a)]) for (i in 1:length(cn)){ tmp <- a %>% dplyr::select(years, cn[i]) %>% group_by_at(2) %>% dplyr::summarise( mean(years)) %>% dplyr::select(-1) colnames(tmp) <- cn[i] res <- cbind(res, tmp) print(cn[i]) } ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "Brainstorm" [1] "Brain Vision An.. " [1] "EEGLAB" [1] "ERPLAB" [1] "FieldTrip" [1] "LIMO" [1] "MNE-Python" [1] "SPM" [1] "Custom scripts" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} res %>% t() %>% row_to_names(row_number = 1) %>% data.frame() %>% dplyr::rename(., not_used = X0, used = X1) %>% tibble::rownames_to_column(., "software") %>% dplyr::mutate(., not_used = round(not_used, 2), used = round(used, 2)) %>% dplyr::mutate(., status = ifelse(not_used > used, "younger", "older")) %>% mutate(status = cell_spec(status, color = ifelse(status == "younger", "green", "black"))) %>% kable(escape = F, booktabs = T) %>% kable_styling("striped", position = "center",) %>% add_header_above(header = c(" " = 1, "Years of user experience" = 3)) %>% kable_classic(full_width = T, html_font = "Arial") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Years of user experience
software not_used used status
BESA 7.68 8.58 older
Brainstorm 7.54 8.71 older
Brain Vision An.. 7.76 7.70 younger
EEGLAB 6.27 8.68 older
ERPLAB 7.39 9.17 older
FieldTrip 7.53 7.99 older
LIMO 7.49 11.08 older
MNE-Python 8.22 7.02 younger
SPM 7.65 8.58 older
Custom scripts 7.17 8.74 older
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # number of used software and years of experience ny <- merge(data.frame(rowSums(software)), data[20]) %>% rename_at(vars(colnames(.)), ~ c("n_soft", "years")) %>% filter(years < 50) %>% data.frame() ny %>% lm(data=., n_soft ~ years) %>% summary(.) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Call: lm(formula = n_soft ~ years, data = .) Residuals: Min 1Q Median 3Q Max -9.206 -4.706 -1.206 2.544 23.294 Coefficients: Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|) (Intercept) 1.071e+01 5.988e-02 178.8 <2e-16 *** years -8.780e-16 6.211e-03 0.0 1 --- Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 Residual standard error: 6.421 on 32398 degrees of freedom Multiple R-squared: 4.853e-28, Adjusted R-squared: -3.087e-05 F-statistic: 1.572e-23 on 1 and 32398 DF, p-value: 1 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} ny %>% ggplot(., aes(x=n_soft, y=years)) + geom_point() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](connections_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # number of used software and self assessment merge(data.frame(rowSums(software)), data[21]) %>% rename_at(vars(colnames(.)), ~ c("n_soft", "selfass")) %>% #lm(data=., n_soft ~ selfass) %>% summary(.) ggplot(., aes(y=n_soft, x=selfass)) + geom_violin() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](connections_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ## In search of single variable representing experience ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggpairs(exp_data[1:2]) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](connections_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggpairs(exp_data[4:5]) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](connections_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggpairs(exp_data[3:5]) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](connections_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggpairs(exp_data) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` `stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`. `stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`. `stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`. ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](connections_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
